text:
I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy,

Down in my heart... Where?
Down in my heart... Where?
Down in my heart.

I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy

Down in my heart.. glory to His name.
I've got the peace that

passeth understanding...

| hear the Spirit crying ‘Abba, Father’
| know the Father, Son and
Spirit's living...
